passages.name: GetOutRadio

passages.text:
Well, that’s an interesting thought, right Horace?

[[SilentHorace01]]
passages.name: TalkAtHoraceA0

passages.text:
I tell you, we're definitly in the best possible dimension. The farm was nice and Mam' was always good to me, but it’s time for me to really strike out on my own, you know?

[[Continue. ->SilentHorace02]]
passages.name: TalkAtHoraceA1A
Start

passages.text:
Not sure if I can sleep tonight. I’ve heard so much about Purple Town… Barmans Bar & Shag, the Low-Noon street.. it’s where all the big movers and shakers made their mark, you know?

[[Continue. ->SilentHorace03]]
passages.name: TalkAtHoraceA1B

passages.text:
Can you stop your prattling for one second Jessie? I'm trying to listen to the song.

[["Sorry!"->ObjectionA1]]
passages.name: ObjectionA

passages.text:
Hey! I'm listening to that!

[["Sorry Horace!"->ObjectionBA]]
passages.name: ObjectionB

passages.text:
[i]Horace stays silent for a long moment before answering.[/i]
It's nothing. I just haven't been to Purple Town in ages.

[["You rarely talk about it. Ever meet someone famous?" ->RarelyTalk]]

links.name: "You rarely talk about it. Ever meet someone famous?"

passages.name: ItsNothing

passages.text:
[i]Horace lets out a puff of air and stamps his hoof once, before turning to look at you.[i/]
Sometimes I forgot how young you are.

[[Be insulted -> What'sThat?]]
passages.name: DialogueA1b

passages.text:
Small, angry, a hell of a gunslinger. I'm not surprised she turned to raiding Tombie Caravans and general banditry though. Even back then she had a vicious streak.

[["I'd still like to meet her!" ->MeetHer]]
passages.name: SheWas

passages.text:
//After Horaces gets in a few more jokes on your expense, his mood has picked up a little and you say goodnight to each other. You turn of the camp-heater and lie down to sleep. Purple Town awaits!//

{SceneA2.0 Jessie x Horace}
passages.name: FinishHoraceTeasing

passages.text:
Look, it's not just that. If you think people at the farm gave you a hard time for wanting to be a Cowgirl, you are in for shock when we get to Purple Town.

[["I know." ->IKnow]]
passages.name: NotJustThat

passages.text:
I think whatever happens, if you keep that attitude up you'll do fine.

[[Continue. ->Finish2]]
passages.name: WhateverHappens

passages.text:
//Horace whinies irritated and kneels down to sleep.//

[[COntinue. ->NoReason]]
passages.name: IrritatedHorace

passages.text:
//You leave Horace to his thoughts and mull over what he said. It's true that you haven't ever really been anywhere, or with anyone, but your confident things will turn out alright. AFter turning off the Heater, you lie down to sleep. Tomorrow, Purple Town awaits!//

{SceneA2.0 Jessie x Horace}
passages.name: FinishSilent

passages.text:
//You are certain Horace knows you are trying to distract him from his gloomy mood. He seems grateful for it, and starts talking to you about possible routes and dangers, what to look out for on the road. It doesn't take long before he sidetracked into one of his war stories about exploring the eastern reaches you already know inside out. With Horace voice in your ear and thoughts of adventure on your mind, you fall asleep."//

{SceneA2.0 Jessie x Horace}
passages.name: FinishDistraction

passages.text:
...

[["We're in the best dimension already." ->TalkAtHoraceA1A]]

[["I'm excited about tomorrow.”->TalkAtHoraceA1B]]
passages.name: SilentHorace01

passages.text:
...

[["I have a dream, Horace."->TalkAtHoraceA2A]]
passages.name: SilentHorace02

passages.text:
I know everyone's thinking i'm daft to try, but I just have to. Sure as heck, everyone says there are no cowboys, but I can wrangle a buggalo just as well as Mam could, she said so herself.

[[Continue. ->silence01]]
passages.name: TalkAtHoraceA2A

links.name: "There must be more for me out there."

passages.name: silence01

passages.text:
Washing dishes, doing laundry, raising kids. That's just not me, you know? Not to mention... Ah, maybe it's too much to hope. But there must be [i]someone[/i] out there for me too, you know?

[[Continue. ->ObjectionA]]
passages.name: WishA1

passages.text:
...

[["Maybe we could have gotten there today."->TalkAtHoraceA3A]]

links.name: "Maybe we could have gotten there today."

passages.name: SilentHorace03

passages.text:
Maybe we should have kept going. Wouldn't have been there before nightfall, but it wouldn't have been [i]that[/i] late.

[[Continue. ->silence02]]
passages.name: TalkAtHoraceA3A

passages.text:
//The song fills the silence.//


[[You're right, the night is dangerous.->TalkAtHoraceA4A]]

links.name: You're right, the night is dangerous.

passages.name: silence02

passages.text:
I guess you'r right though, traveling by night's too dangerous.

[[ "I just can't wait." ->Can'tWait]]
[[ "Well, Goodnight Horace." ->Goodnight Horace]]
passages.name: TalkAtHoraceA4A

passages.text:
Sorry.

[[//Sit quietly// ->Silence03]]
passages.name: ObjectionA1

links.name: "Nice song, but a bit too sad for my tastes."

passages.name: Silence03

passages.text:
Sorry, sorry! I just thought... you were so quiet.

[[Continue. ->ObjectionBB]]
passages.name: ObjectionBA

passages.text:
Yes. Because I. Was. Listening.

[i]Horace wirelessly turns the radio on again.[/i]


[[Finish listening to the song together with Horace.->Silence03]]

links.name: Finish listening to the song together with Horace.

passages.name: ObjectionBB

passages.text:
I just can't wait. I wanted to do this for so long, and now that we are so close...

[[Continue. ->ObjectionA]]
passages.name: Can'tWait

passages.text:
Well... Goodnight Horace. 

[[You turn off the radio. ->ObjectionB]]
passages.name: Goodnight Horace

passages.text:
You look pretty down Horace, everything ok?

[[Continue. ->ItsNothing]]
passages.name: AreYouOkay

passages.text:
Sure, I met an awful lot of folk. Even met Billy the Tit once, way back before she became a Highwaylady.

[["Oh wow, she's a legend!" ->OhWow!]]

[["What were you doing to meet so many people?" ->That'sCrazy]]

links.name: "What were you doing to meet so many people?"

passages.name: SureIMet

passages.text:
Oh wow, she's a legend! How did you meet, how was she?

[[Continue. ->SheWas]]
passages.name: OhWow!

passages.text:
I'd still like to meet her someday!

[[Continue. ->BeCool]]
passages.name: MeetHer

passages.text:
If you do meet her, or any other Cowgirl you heard of... try not to be just so much [i]you[/i], okay? Play it cool.

[["I'm cool!" -> FinishHoraceTeasing]]

[["I'll try." ->Fanboy]]
passages.name: BeCool

passages.text:
Heh, okay. I know I can be a bit of a fanboy, I'll keep it in mind.

[[Continue.->NotJustThat]]
passages.name: Fanboy

passages.text:
I know, lots of people are going to laugh at me.

[[Continue. ->MoreThanLaugh]]
passages.name: IKnow

passages.text:
If you aren't careful, they'll do more than laugh.

[["That's disheartening." ->Disheartening]]
passages.name: MoreThanLaugh

passages.text:
That's pretty disheartening.

[[Continue. -> Don'tMeanTo]]
passages.name: Disheartening

passages.text:
Don't mean to discourage you. Just keep your wits about you.

[["Thanks." ->Thanks]]
passages.name: Don'tMeanTo

passages.text:
Thanks, you'r a good friend, Horace.

[[Go to sleep. ->Sleep]]
passages.name: Thanks

passages.text:
//You turn off the Camp-Heater and lie down. Tomorrow, Purple Town awaits!//

{SceneA2.0 Jessie x Horace}
passages.name: Sleep

passages.text:
What's that supposed to mean?!

[[Continue. ->JustThat]]
passages.name: What'sThat?

passages.text:
Just that. Life and love are a sad affair Jessie, it's best to just have some fun. You'll learn.


[["You'r grumpy. Why?" ->YourGrumpy]]

[["Pretty condescending." ->PrettyCondescending]]
passages.name: JustThat

passages.text:
You'r unusually grumpy today, Horace. what's going on?

[[Continue. ->SilentHorace]]
passages.name: YourGrumpy

passages.text:
You can be pretty condescending, you know that?

[[Continue. ->HoraceApology]]
passages.name: PrettyCondescending
HoraceApology

passages.text:
Do... you want to talk about it?

[[Continue. ->NotReally]]
passages.name: WantToTalk?

passages.text:
Not really. It was a long time ago, and what's done is done.

[["But doesn't the past affect the present?" ->PastAffectPresent]]

[["Right, what matters is the present." ->PresentMatters]]

links.name: "But doesn't the past affect the present?"

passages.name: NotReally

passages.text:
I'm not sure. If different dimensions have an effect on each other, sure as heck the past has on the present, right?

[[Continue. ->IrritatedHorace]]
passages.name: PastAffectPresent

passages.text:
Yeah, and that you'd rather bottle it all up.

[[Continue. ->GoodnightJessie]]
passages.name: BottleUp

passages.text:
Goodnight, Jessie.

[[Continue. ->SleepandThink]]
passages.name: GoodnightJessie

passages.text:
//You turn off the Camp-Heater and lie down to sleep. You can't help but imagine a future you looking back on you now. Who will you be and what will you have experienced? With thoughts of fame, riches and a beautiful lover in your arms, you fall asleep.//

{SceneA2.0 Jessie x Horace}
passages.name: SleepandThink

passages.text:
You'r probably right. What matters is who we are now!

[[Continue. ->NodAndSleep]]
passages.name: PresentMatters

passages.text:
//Horace nods quietly, and the two off you talk a little more before you turn of the Camp-Light and lie down to sleep.//

{SceneA2.0 Jessie x Horace}
passages.name: NodAndSleep

links.name: Wait for him to say something.

passages.name: SilentHorace

passages.text:
Apology accepted. You know you can talk to me about whatever happened right?

[[Continue. ->NotRightNow]]
passages.name: ApologyAccepted

passages.text:
Yeah, just... not right now, okay?

[["Okay." ->Okay]]

[["Sure. Soooo... when will we get there tomorrow?" ->Distraction]]

links.name: "Sure. Soooo... when will we get there tomorrow?"

passages.name: NotRightNow

passages.text:
Sure. Sooo... when do you think we'll arrive in Purple Town tomorrow?

[[Continue. ->FinishDistraction]]
passages.name: Distraction

passages.text:
Okay.

[[Continue. ->FinishSilent]]
passages.name: Okay

passages.text:
That's crazy! What were you doing in Purple Town back then, that you met so many folk?

[[Continue. ->ThisandThat]]
passages.name: That'sCrazy

passages.text:
"This and that, a bit off everything. Had a different frame back then, and worked for whoever needed a hand with heavy lifting."

[["I can't imagine you in a different frame. ->CantImagine]]

links.name: "I can't imagine you in a different frame.

passages.name: ThisandThat

passages.text:
You never talk about your time in the Town... Did you ever meet someone famous?

[[Continue. ->SureIMet]]
passages.name: RarelyTalk

passages.text:
"Huh, I can't imagine you not being a horse."

[[Continue. ->SometimesIForget]]
passages.name: CantImagine

passages.text:
Sometimes I forget just how little you've seen of the world.

[["Feel Insulted" -> NotThatNaive]]

[["So much left to see!" -> MoreToSee]]
passages.name: SometimesIForget

passages.text:
Hey, I'm not [b]that[/b] naive!

[[Continue. -> FinishHoraceTeasing]]
passages.name: NotThatNaive

passages.text:
Eh, that just means I have so much more left to see!

[[Continue. ->WhateverHappens]]
passages.name: MoreToSee

passages.text:
//The two of you talk a little bit more, before you turn of the Camp-Heater and lie down to sleep. Tomorrow, Purple Town awaits!"//

{SceneA2.0 Jessie x Horace}
passages.name: Finish2

passages.text:
Howdy friends, and welcome to Sallys Smoke-Signals! I hope you’r all doin’ fine in the outland. Girls, I tell ya' I've been having a blast makin' my way through the eastern reaches. Few days ago I stumbled upon an ol' holo-theater and that's been something! The Holo that got me got me thinkin' the most was "The infinite Lover" by a lady called Grega E. Weird name, sure, but what a story! A hot flick about two sweet boys trying to find love, and each of their actions affecting not just their, but all the other possible dimensions. So in some worlds, they got together, and while they didn't get together in all, there still was a sort of ripple effect spreadin' love out through infinity.

[[Continue. ->SmokeSignal2]]
passages.name: SmokeSignal1

passages.text:
Sure as hell, we know other dimensions exist, but what I never thought about: What if we affect them, eh? Every choice we make, every thing we do, every Mouse we squash and every Woman we shoot affects a neighborin' dimension. What a thought. Before I leave you to our evenings first song: If we all affect not just us and those around us, but those in neighborin' dimensions, we better take care and make sure we try our best, so all our possible us-es do too, and we end up in the best of possible worlds, and make every other a bit better along the way!

[[Continue.->Song]]
passages.name: SmokeSignal2
Song

passages.text:
Look, Jessie... I'm sorry. You are a good kid. That song, just now before we reach Purple Town, it just was a bit much.

[["Apology accepted." ->ApologyAccepted]]
passages.name: LookJessie

passages.text:
Sorry I asked. 

[[Continue.->LetsJustSLeep]]
passages.name: SorryIAsked

passages.text:
Let's just sleep.

[[Go to sleep. ->FinishMiffed]]
passages.name: LetsJustSLeep

passages.text:
//You go to sleep feeling frustrated with Horace. He notices, but doesn't say anything, which only makes you more annoyed. At some point during the night you manage to let go a little and focus on the coming adventure. After all, tomorrow you'll reach Purple Town!//

{SceneA2.0 Jessie x Horace}
passages.name: FinishMiffed

passages.text:
All I'm saying is there's no reason to brood.

[["And that you want to bottle it up." ->BottleUp]]

links.name: "And that you want to bottle it up."

passages.name: NoReason
